name: Top Frogging
description:
When sixteen year old Bianca’s classmate doubts her Valoribbit skills, she vows to 1v1 him on the popular frog-based shooter to teach him a lesson, but ends up learning something important herself. 

Top Frogging is a a short, illustrated interactive fiction game made by Laura Romano for the 7th Narrative Driven Game Jam. Thanks for playing! 

CW: Gaming-related misogyny

Note: This game has no relation to the popular ant-based shooter of a similar title. Not that anyone plays that game because all of the insect characters are too tiny and it’s impossible to head shot with those hit boxes. 

Twitter/Instagram: @lauraromayes

Website: https://lauraromayes.carrd.co
